content: I have a cargo binary project directory containing custom cargo directives in a .cargo/config dir within. While the project builds fine as expected when cargo is invoked from within, I find that invoking a build from 'outside' the project directory using the '--manifest-path' directive ignores the customisations in the .cargo/config. FWIW the customisations are a [build] section to define the intended target to build for as well as target specific rustflags. I thought I'd ask if this is expected behaviour before digging further. Any pointers appreciated! Thanks.
I believe Philipp Oppermann already opened an issue about this. Let me search.
Would filing an issue for this be the way to go ? Happy to.
I found it anyway. It was a thread on internals.rust-lang.org: https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/problems-of-cargo-config-files-and-possible-solutions/12987
